Question
========

Given the probability that events A and B occur together P(A∩B) = 0.4. Furthermore, given is the probability of A P(A) = 0.5 and the probability of B P(B) = 0.4. The conditional probability of A given B P(A∩B) is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.6
* 0.8
* 1

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.6: Incorrect
* 0.8: Incorrect
* 1: Correct
